### Willow statistics




```{r}
prob = 0.05
var_p = prob * (1 - prob)
num_perm_samples = 1000      # 70 = empirical p val = 0.1
var_p_n = var_p / num_perm_samples
sd_p_n = sqrt(var_p_n)

# 0.025 quantile
max(0, (prob-1.96*sd_p_n))

# 0.0975 quantile of true empirical p-val
prob + 1.96 * sd_p_n

```
